name: Shiva Global Environmental
description: supplying of Water & Waste Water Treatme
overview:
Shiva Global Environmental Pvt. Ltd is established in 2012 but our presence in the market is from the last 20 years with the name of mother entity M/S Hydro Treat Technologies was established in year 1994.

Products & Services: Domestic Sewage Treatment Plant Packaged Sewage Treatment Plant Commercial Sewage Treatment Plant Containerized Sewage Treatment Plant

Our Team: Our team compromises of 11-25 experienced and qualified professionals and they utilize a coordinated approach to be able to deliver cost-effective solutions for varied markets.

Our Infrastructure:L We are basically a New Delhi based firm that deals in supplying, manufacturing, exporting, service providing, and trade of water management services.

Our Quality: Owing to the experienced group of employees and latest technology, we are able to produce very high quality products and services. Our product undergoes various quality testing procedures at each and every level of production to ensure flawless delivery of product and services.
